Template filters¶

title¶

String filter that performs title case conversion on a per-word basis, leaving words containing upper-case letters alone.

{{ "start 6PM"|title }}   # Start 6PM
{{ "sTart 6pm"|title }}   # sTart 6pm

Warning

Be careful when loading the django_tables2 template library to not inadvertently load title. You should always use the {% load ... from ... %} syntax.
